'''nu''' is the [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] word for "under" or "beneath".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 66</ref>

==Examples==
* '''''nu''' luini yassen tintilar i eleni'' = "'''beneath''' the blue vaults of Varda wherein the stars tremble"<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}, line 6</ref> ([[Quenya]])

* ''[[Taur-nu-Fuin (Dorthonion)|Taur-'''nu'''-Fuin]]'' = "Forest-'''under'''-nightshade"<ref>{{S|Index}}, entry ''Taur-nu-Fuin''</ref> ([[Sindarin]])
